title: Mansfield Park
creator_credit: BBC, Betty Willingdale and David Giles
brief_description: Fanny Price is brought up as the poor relation in her wealthy uncle’s mansion, Mansfield Park. Based on the Jane Austen novel of upper class life and manners in 18th Century England, this is a stylish production with excellent performances from Anna Massey, Bernard Hepton and Angela Pleasence.
